subject: {{sender.contact_name}} needs to sign their credit agreement

rows.text: Great news! {{sender.contact_name}}'s application has been approved by the lender - all they need to do is sign their credit documents. They can access these by following the link sent to them by both Kanda and the lender.
Kanda will update you once the documents have been signed so that you know what the next steps are. We've told the customer what to do.
